content.html: He's Captain America. This is not up for debate. This is a fact. As for "who is entitled to the shield", Sam is. Sam is who Steve gave that shield to. Sam deserves to be Cap, and Anthony Mackie deserves some more respect. This is a shameful headline.
content.value: He's Captain America. This is not up for debate. This is a fact. As for "who is entitled to the shield", Sam is. Sam is who Steve gave that shield to. Sam deserves to be Cap, and Anthony Mackie deserves some more respect. This is a shameful headline.
